title: Hello!
text:
Hi there! Welcome to my teaching and training website. This is a repository for all the teaching and training materials that I am currently using or have previously delivered.
My background is in Biomedical Engineering (with a focus on mechanobiology, cardiovascular physiology, and tissue engineering). My research interests include:

Biomechanics and Mechanobiology
Exercise Physiology and Biomechanics in Sports
Biomedical Device Design and Development
Healthcare Data Science

I am also a Certified Carpentries Instructor and a trainer with the Digital Research Academy. I am passionate about training students on the basics of computational thinking, and I am an ardent promoter of using open-source tools (such as R/Python) to solve data analysis and visualization problems.
